name: Alice in Wonderland Adventure
description:
Join Alice on her journey through wonderland. as you search for different hidden objects. There are no timers or points to score, just AMAZING images of wonderland. Find all the hidden objects at your own pace!

FEATURES:
- Hidden Object adventure game
- Based on Lewis Carroll’s Alice in Wonderland.
- BREATHTAKING and BEAUTIFUL visuals!
- No timers, or points to score
- Fun for adults and little kids as well

If you like hidden objects games, then you will love this app!
